movielibrary

Class Library

  • java.lang.Object
    • movielibrary.Library

  • public class Library
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Library Class, where the Movies are stored in a "collection"
    Since:
    10th December 2017
    Version:
    0.3 (Filter)
    Author:
    Quentin KAMENDA - ISEN Lille 2017

      • checkMovie

        public boolean checkMovie(Movie movie)
        Checks the name and the director of the movie and its name to see if the Movie is already in the collection.
        Parameters:
        movie - the movie to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the movie is already in the collection; false if not.

      • yearMovies

        public java.util.ArrayList<Movie> yearMovies(java.lang.Integer year)
        Filters the movies in the collection by release year
        Parameters:
        year - (Integer) the year
        Returns:
        (ArrayList of Movies) the list of movies from the wanted year
